metadata.name: Minimal Style #1
metadata.description:
In the middle of the vast, scorching desert, a tall and gate stands alone, marking the entrance to an unknown territory.
The sky on the other side of the gate is a clear, bright blue, with fluffy white clouds scattered sparsely across the horizon.

A lone figure can be seen in the distance, approaching the gate. 

As people pass by the gate, it appears that only one person has taken notice of the stranger approaching through it.
